meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Regulation of Mercury Federal regulators were effectively cleared to write regulations forcing power plants to reduce mercury emissions. Eating fish tainted with mercury poses a risk. PAGE A16
A Swiss Bid for PaineWebber UBS, the Swiss banking company, has offered to buy the brokerage firm PaineWebber for about $12 billion in cash and stock, executives close to the deal said. PAGE C1
Regulation of Mercury Federal regulators were effectively cleared to write regulations forcing power plants to reduce mercury emissions. Eating fish tainted with mercury poses a risk. PAGE A16
A Swiss Bid for PaineWebber UBS, the Swiss banking company, has offered to buy the brokerage firm PaineWebber for about $12 billion in cash and stock, executives close to the deal said. PAGE C1
American League Wins Derek Jeter of the Yankees was the most valuable player as the American League beat the National League, 6-3, in the All-Star Game. SPORTSWEDNESDAY, PAGE D1
Rangers Decide on Coach The Rangers, continuing their rebuilding, will introduce Ron Low, another former Edmonton Oiler, as their head coach today. PAGE D1
